# VZMacOSRestoreImage

**Class**

An object that describes a version of macOS to install on to a virtual machine.

## Declaration

```swift
class VZMacOSRestoreImage
```

## Overview

To set up a new VM compatible with the restore image, use [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacOSRestoreImage/mostFeaturefulSupportedConfiguration] to obtain the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacPlatformConfiguration/hardwareModel] of the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacPlatformConfiguration]. Then, create a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacOSRestoreImage] object by loading an installation media file. Initialize a [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacOSInstaller] object with this `VZMacOSRestoreImage` object to install the operating system onto a VM.



## Getting Information About the Restore Image

- **buildVersion**: The build version this restore image contains.
- **isSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current host supports this restore image.
- **mostFeaturefulSupportedConfiguration**: This object represents the most fully featured configuration that’s supported by both the current host and by this restore image.
- **operatingSystemVersion**: The operating system version this restore image contains.
- **url**: The URL of this restore image.

## Controlling the Restoration Process

- **fetchLatestSupported(completionHandler:)**: Fetches the latest restore image supported by this host from the network.
- **load(from:completionHandler:)**: Load a restore image from a file on the local file system.
- **latestSupported**: Fetches the latest restore image supported by this host from the network.
- **image(from:)**: Load a restore image from a file on the local file system.

## Related Documentation

- **VZMacHardwareModel**: A specification for the hardware elements and configurations present in a particular Mac hardware model.

## Installers

- **VZMacOSInstaller**: An object you use to install macOS on the specified virtual machine.
- **VZMacOSConfigurationRequirements**: An object that describes the parameter constraints required by a specific configuration of macOS.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
